Name: Sharon and the Last Garden
About the game: This game is a 3D puzzle action game. The main character, Sharon's mission is to cleanse the dirty world with the power of bacteria. - A unique ruined world Ghost animals are wandering around on the stage. Let's relieve them use the power of the remaining bacteria. - Small Low-Poly 3D Stages Take action in the 3D world and capture stage gimmicks. A small stage and gentle music combine to create a unique world view. - Lightweight and Fast Startup The auto-save and auto-load functions allow you to easily play this game. It also works very lightly as a 3D game. * If the load is heavy, you can make it lighter by changing the graphics settings.
